column.name: synopsis
column.value: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

column.name: synopsis
column.value: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

column.name: synopsis
column.value: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

column.name: synopsis
column.value: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

column.name: synopsis
column.value: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

column.name: synopsis
column.value: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

column.name: synopsis
column.value: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

column.name: synopsis
column.value: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

column.name: synopsis
column.value: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

column.name: synopsis
column.value: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
